programme.title: The Cow
programme.desc: Upon arriving at a remote cabin for a getaway, a woman and her boyfriend discover another couple already staying there. They decide to share the rental for the night, but the boyfriend's disappearance sparks a race for answers.

programme.title: Vesper
programme.desc: Struggling to survive with her father after the collapse of Earth's ecosystem, 13-year-old Vesper must use her wits, strength and bio-hacking abilities to fight for the future.

programme.title: Rare Objects
programme.desc: A young woman with a traumatic past seeks to rebuild her life when she begins working at a New York City antique shop.

programme.title: Taurus
programme.desc: A rising but troubled musician searches for the inspiration to record his next song, pushing himself deep into the void.

programme.title: Bloody Axe Wound
programme.desc: In the small town of Clover Falls, Abbie Bladecut navigates the inheritance of her father's real-life slasher business.

programme.title: Neighborhood Watch
programme.desc: Believing he witnessed an abduction, a young man turns to his next-door neighbor, a retired security guard, to help him find the missing woman.

programme.title: Skincare
programme.desc: A famed aesthetician faces a new challenge when a rival opens a skin care boutique directly across from her store. Suspecting that someone is trying to sabotage her, she embarks on a quest to unravel the mystery of who's trying to destroy her life.

programme.title: Force of Nature: The Dry 2
programme.desc: Five women head out on a remote hiking retreat but only four return, each telling a different story. Detective Aaron Falk must find out what really happened before time runs out.

programme.title: Armand
programme.desc: When Elisabeth is called to a parent-teacher conference after hours, she is presented with scathing allegations that trigger a tangled web of accusations between parents and faculty.

programme.title: Ghostlight
programme.desc: When a construction worker joins a local theater's production of "Romeo and Juliet," the drama onstage starts to mirror his own life.

programme.title: Inheritance
programme.desc: When Maya learns that her father was once a spy, she suddenly finds herself at the center of an international conspiracy. In her quest for answers, she must travel the globe, mastering her father's skills and unraveling the mysteries of his past.

programme.title: Dandelion
programme.desc: A struggling singer-songwriter falls into an intoxicating romance that leads her to a deeper appreciation of her artistic journey as she discovers a voice that is authentically her own.

programme.title: The Almond and the Seahorse
programme.desc: An archaeologist and an architect fight to reimagine a future after a traumatic brain injury leaves them adrift from the people they love.

programme.title: Comic Book Men
programme.desc: Mike and Ming participate in a 5K zombie run for Kevin's charity; Walt buys an unusual item.

programme.title: Formuła 1: Grand Prix Wielkiej Brytanii
programme.desc: Dwunasta runda tegorocznego cyklu będzie miała szczególne znaczenia dla Lewisa Hamiltona. Po przenosinach do Ferrari wyniki Brytyjczyka pozostawiają wiele do życzenia, lecz zmagania na legendarnym torze Silverstone mogą się okazać dla niego momentem zwrotnym sezonu. Siedmiokrotny mistrz świata wygrał tu rekordowe dziewięć wyścigów, ostatni z nich w 2024 roku. Było to wówczas jego pierwsze zwycięstwo od ponad 900 dni! Od ponownego przebudzenia Hamiltona bardziej prawdopodobny wydaje się jednak triumf innego z Brytyjczyków - George'a Russella, jego byłego partnera z Mercedesa, lub Landa Norrisa z bardzo szybkiego w obecnej kampanii McLarena. Na Silverstone błysnąć postara się też Oscar Piastri, który mimo delikatnego potknięcia w Grand Prix Kanady pozostał liderem klasyfikacji generalnej kierowców.
